en.title: FE's First Event in Vietnam! (1)
en.content:
FE's first event in Vietnam at the Kimdo Royal Hotel, Ho Chi Minh City, was well attended by around 250 Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. FE's CEO Paul Ting attended together with around 20 key leaders including 12 Presidential Directors from Malaysia and Vietnam. There was a light and sound show and catwalks by models displaying FE's Quantum Pendant, Bracelet and Flask. Paul presented the company's Vision and Strategies for 2009 to the enthusiastic audience. FE Spokesmen Foo Kok Keong and Jean Daniel shared their testimonials together with PDs Paul Lee, Sam Ho, Jankij, Don Chan and KC Phoon. KC Phoon and Jean Daniels performed demonstration with the Quantum Pendant.

Guests of honour include Miss Nguyen Thi Giang My, former Miss Vietnam and current host of popular TV talk show, Mr Doan Nguyen, prominent Vietnamese businessman and Ms Le Thuy Hang, Head of Saigon Jewellery, Vietnam (Saigon Jewellery has created many designs as accessories for FE's Quantum Pendant. Saigon Jewellery is Vietnam's largest chain of jewellery outlets with 65 shops all over the country).

FE would like to give a BIG THANK YOU to FE's Vietnam Country Licensee, Miss Le Ngoc Hieu and her team for a great job done! Thank you also to her up lines KC Tey and Paul & Doris Lee for helping to organize the successful event.

Ho Chi Minh is a very vibrant and bustling city with a population of around 10 million and we are VERY confidant FE will do very well there, especially with the support of so many of our top leaders.

(Another thing, the food is REALLY good in Ho Chi Minh City! Just ask those leaders who went there).

SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!! AHOO!! AHOO!! AHOO!!
 
< Click Here For More Photos >

meta.author: klhunter
